hero.title: TopoAtlantico
hero.subtitle1: Surveying and mapping services in the Canary Islands.
hero.subtitle2: Tailored precision solutions to meet your needs.

levantamientos.title: Land Surveying & Mapping
levantamientos.desc: We carry out precise topographic surveys for engineering, construction, and cartography. generating maps, contour lines, 3D terrain models, cut & fill analysis.

replanteo.title: Construction Setting Out
replanteo.desc: High-precision setting-out services for building and civil works: structures, earthworks, drainage, etc.

parcelas.title: Property Boundary Measurement
parcelas.desc: Accurate measurement of rural and urban plots, boundary demarcation, and detailed area and volume calculations.

asistencia.title: Surveys Inspection & QA Reports
asistencia.desc: Control of layouts, Excavation & fill volume calculations, leveling. We ensure geometric precision at all project stages.

monitoreo.title: Monitoring & Structural Surveying
monitoreo.desc: Tracking structural and ground deformations using high-precision instruments.

drones.title: Drones & Photogrammetry
drones.desc: We capture high-resolution aerial imagery to create orthophotos, 3D models, point clouds, earthwork volume estimation.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: TopoAtlantico is a new surveying firm based in the Canary Islands. We combine local expertise with advanced technology to deliver precise results at reduced costs.

list.2: Precision equipment: total station, GNSS, multirotor drones

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Request a quote or check availability. We'll reply within 24–48 h.
contact.name: Name
contact.success_message: ✅ Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you soon.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.content: This website belongs to TopoAtlántico. The information on this page is for informational purposes only. We are not responsible for any misuse of its content. Access to this site implies acceptance of the terms of use described here.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: At TopoAtlantico, we respect your privacy and guarantee the protection of your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). The information you provide will be used solely to respond to your inquiries or quote requests.
